mapper.select:
/* selectEtcDailyServiceMain */
SELECT ETC_SERVICE_ID AS etcServiceId ,ETC_MAIN_ID AS etcMainId ,ETC_MAIL_CHK AS etcErpMailServiceChk ,ETC_MAIL_BIGO AS etcErpMailServiceBigo ,ETC_APPROVE_CHK AS etcErpApproveServiceChk ,ETC_APPROVE_BIGO AS etcErpApproveServiceBigo ,ETC_BACKUP_CHK AS etcErpBackUpServiceChk ,ETC_BACKUP_BIGO AS etcErpBackUpServiceBigo FROM ETC_DAILY_SERVICE WHERE ETC_MAIN_ID = #{etcMainId}
